DocLocalization.Name: Bezieht sich auf eine rÃ¤umliche Struktur - Relation

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedElements
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Set of products, which are referenced within this level of the spatial structure hierarchy.
NOTE  Referenced elements are contained elsewhere within the spatial structure, they are referenced additionally by this spatial structure element, e.g., because they span several stories.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingStructure
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Spatial structure element, within which the element is referenced. Any element can be contained within zero, one or many elements of the project spatial and zoning structure.
IFC4 CHANGE  The attribute RelatingStructure as been promoted to the new supertype IfcSpatialElement with upward compatibility for file based exchange.

DocWhereRule.Name: AllowedRelatedElements
DocWhereRule.Documentation:
The relationship object shall not be used to include other spatial structure elements into a spatial structure element. The hierarchy of the spatial structure is defined using IfcRelAggregates. Exception: an IfcSpace can be referenced by another spatial structure element, in particular by an IfcSpatialZone.
IFC4 CHANGE  The relaxation to allow IfcSpace has been included.
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* RelatedElements | ('IFCPRODUCTEXTENSION.IFCSPATIALSTRUCTUREELEMENT' IN TYPEOF(temp)) AND (NOT ('IFCPRODUCTEXTENSION.IFCSPACE' IN TYPEOF(temp))) )) = 0
